climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Package Content: 2 Panels of white semi sheer curtains. Each panel measures 52"W x 84"L.
Unique Design: Subtle cotton touch surface with elegant nice-looking semi sheer fabric, add a simple style modern sense to your room.
Main Function: light filtering while privacy protecting. Invite a certain amount of light gently through the sheer curtain, also help to darken your room.
Suitable Match: Constructed with 1.6" inner diameter rod pocket and 1.2" long header hem. Can be hung separately, or arrange in pairs with blackout curtains in Melodieux.
Easy Care: Machine wash with laundry bag or dry clean, gentle cycle, do not bleach, tumble dry low.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 More Colors 2 Multiple Scenarios 3 Color Difference

Easy Installation - Rod Pocket Top Constructed with 1.7 inch inner diameter rod pocket and 1.2 inch header hem, can perfectly fit the most home curtain rods. Easy to hang the curtains and slide smoothly along the rods. Light Filtering & Privacy Protecting This semi transparent light filtering curtain is not too sheer to let numerous amount of light to go through, therefore people couldn't see anything from outside of the windows, which is a perfect balance of light and privacy. Soft & Textured Material We adopt high quality cross grain linen look fabric, which is super soft and elegant, bringing a lightweight and finished look to your rooms. Exquisite craftsmanship plus the elegant material make this semi sheer curtain favored by most of our customers. Matching Grommet Top Style Available Size Options: 42"W x 63"L, 42"W x 84"L, 42"W x 96"L, 52"W x 63"L, 52"W x 84"L, 52"W x 96"L, 52"W x 108"L Colors available: Beige, Blue, Brown, Black, Burgundy, Navy, Cream, Pink, Sage Green, Tan, Gray & White Same linen look fabric with silver metal grommets, 6 grommets for small windows, 8 grommets for normal windows, 16 grommets for wide windows or patio doors. Matching Semi Sheer Valance and Tier Curtains Sizes: Kitchen curtains - 29"W x 24"L / 29"W x 36"L / 29"W x 45"L; Valance - 52"W x 18"L Colors available: Beige, Blue, Black, Brown, Burgundy, Navy, Tan, Pink, Sage Green, Cream, Gray, White... Tier curtains are sold in pairs, valance is sold in single panel. Same matching fabric, uniform style for your window decorations. Matching Sidelight Door Curtains Sizes: 25"W x 40"L / 25"W x 72"L / 52"W x 40"L / 52"W x 72"L Colors available: Beige, Blue, Black, Brown, Burgundy, Navy, Tan, Pink, Sage Green, Cream, Gray, White... Same fabric semi sheer sidelight curtains/french door curtains, sold in pairs, uniform style for your home decorations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect amount of light
reviews.reviewText: These curtains are the perfect amount of sheer! Light peaks in during the day, but offers privacy at night. Great for city living if you want a bit of privacy but are still wanting some natural light. The quality is what you pay for. They look nice but will have to take my steamer to them to release some of the wrinkles. Overall pretty happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what I was looking gor to bring the farmhouse style room together. Love the quality of the material and great price too. Looks awesome in my living room!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice weight to the linen like fabric and no issues with wrinkles, maybe because they are less noticeable in black. I only wanted to frame the window, not block the light so these are perfect. Very happy with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars hard to get wrinkles out
reviews.reviewText: I really like the curtains. They let light in but you cannot see in and out of the room clearly. This bedroom is on the street side, so that is what I wanted. The ONLY reason for the lower score was the wrinkles. I washed them in cold water and used low heat in the dryer. They came out with the same wrinkles that they arrived with. I put them back in the dryer with ice and selected "wrinkle remove" on my dryer. No change. I had to iron them with starch on the polyester setting. Even then, I had to go over ever single wrinkle 8-10 times each before they started to disappear. It took me 80 min to iron and hang the 4 panels. I am 70 yrs old and have purchased MANY curtains in my life. These were the only ones to have these issues. The bottom line is that they do look great BUT you will need to iron them (possibly steam them but I did not attempt that option) for a longer time than you might want! I would take off a star due to the wrinkle issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality is so good
reviews.reviewText: The best shear curtains . Don't hesitate to get it. Excellent fabric

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these curtains!
reviews.reviewText: These are perfect, they let just the right amount of light in and keep the room just dim enough. Length is perfect, bought for my living room, 6 months later bought a second set for my dining room. The color is on point with my decor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got two sets of these for my downstairs living room. Was worried they would be to sheer but they are exactly the right amount of see through. Can get some light in from outside but not enough to see in completly. Easy to install and put up. Only thing that was a little off was the ties that come with it, have this goofy white string. It kind of looks like something for a shower curtain, tossed them into the trash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023

reviews.reviewText: I was very pleased with these curtains. They are sheer enough that the room is bright but not too much sun rays come in. Lovely Material as well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Flowy bright white and look expensive
reviews.reviewText: I loved these curtains. Bought them for all 3 windows in my bedroom. The 96” just pool a little on the floor and look elegant. Really brighten the room making it very Zen with taupe walls. Just need to steam once they’re up

Whatever your window size is you should buy twice that in curtain size so it has a ruffle effect. For the price very good quality, color( grey), and the semi-sheer is perfect for my kitchen. At the end of the day I'm very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good for my purpose, not quite semi-sheer as others I have
reviews.reviewText: This is a great curtain for the price. It's simple, which is what I wanted. I didn't want a pattern as it is hanging behind a sheer curtain with a pattern. The only thing I find is that it is not really what I would consider to be semi-sheer. I have a different curtain from another seller that is truly semi-sheer. I can faintly see what is behind that curtain, which is what I wanted with this one but didn't quite get. Perhaps everyone's idea of semi-sheer is different. However, it was $20, it keeps the hot sun out and people can't see in so it's doing the job. I didn't iron it before hanging it up and it does have a few wrinkles from being folded that I thought might go away but I may end up ironing if that starts to bug me.

OMG...i love these curtains. They are exactly what i needed, sheer enough to let the light in, even maybe getting the room more clear and keeping the two women who live in front of me to stare in my room when they smoke outside on their balcony...They are lovely in the room, well made, no problem at all with them and the texture...wow, just wow. Keep making them, i need more hehe.Update...Wow what is this price increase? It went from 33.99$ from 89.94$!!!!... Yep, for same size and model. I wanted to buy more but I am not interested at this price. I'll go elsewhere.
